content:encoded:
200+ hand-crafted infographics and visualisations, surfacing positive trends, uplifting stats and creative solutions to the world’s problems – in handy, multi-coloured book form.

The book is also full of fresh new infographic primers and visualisations which delve deeper into certain key topics. These are designed to better arm you with context and understanding when doom-scrolling headlines and news stories about climate, or clean energies, or the plastics crisis – or any the major features of the future.

» See inside
» Read some reader reviews (For some reason reviews are not appearing on the main Amazon US book page – you can see them here)
» Order US edition from Amazon or other outlets
» Support local bookshops – order from US Bookshop.org
» 60sec reaction video of author David McCandless seeing the book for the first time

Each with their own unique dataset available online.
